# [Interview #71: ACOS Signing Report - Lara Beaton, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=71#12)

#### Robert Jordan

The next book isn't going to come out until 1998 because RJ is "a sadistic SOB" (his words, not mine).
